title: Meditation: Coming Home to Heartspace (2020-12-16)
itunes:title: Meditation: Coming Home to Heartspace
description: Meditation: Coming Home to Heartspace (2020-12-16) - Our pathway to our hearts is through presence. This meditation helps us awaken presence through our body and all our senses. We then open to the awareness that can meet whatever arises with tenderness and kindness. This meditation includes a reading from the Radiance Sutras, interpreted and translated by Lorin Roche
